title: The Years Between
timeline: 2886.215 to 2886.295 - Years between Ch14 and Ch17
revealed_to_reader: Year 1: Ansible 15% capacity, cultural drift beginning
Year 2: Lira update from deep space confirms Harvesters real, rescue self-interested
Year 3: Extremism decreasing, 3000 dead (vs 8 million before)
Year 4: New generation born expecting silence
Year 5: Threadkeepers detected months away, ansible 7% capacity
Year 6: Lira's 15-year update - final verification before first contact
Year 7: THREADKEEPERS ARRIVE - 12 ships at New Singapore
Seven years transformed humanity from divided to unified
Preparation complete - ready to negotiate, verify, choose
chapter_purpose: Summarize years of preparation, show transformation from division to unity, establish readiness for first contact in Ch17, honor Lira's ongoing sacrifice
